body: I have a problem with the nexus teams, when I pick my team (I can pick cos im a doner) I always find that the team names are not in the team picker,eg: a map with the teams red and blue in the team picker its yellow and orangeso Is it just me or eveyone?
body_tagged: I have a problem with the nexus teams, when I pick my team (I can pick cos im a doner) I always find that the team names are not in the team picker,eg: a map with the teams red and blue in the team picker its yellow and orangeso Is it just me or eveyone?
title: Nexus team picker bug

replies.body: yea, it's a bug and already reported to github. But you can always do /join <teamname>
replies.body_tagged: yea, it's a bug and already reported to github. But you can always do /join <teamname>

replies.body: thank you and thanks for tell me the command XD
replies.body_tagged: thank you and thanks for tell me the command XD

replies.body: can u reply to my staff question if u can u seam help full and maybe u will know XD
replies.body_tagged: can u reply to my staff question if u can u seam help full and maybe u will know XD

replies.body: This is in the wrong section but ok.
replies.body_tagged: This is in the wrong section but ok.

replies.body:
Yes this is a bug. You can always do /join. By doing this you'll automatically get put on one team. You can also do /join [Team Name]. You put the team name, and you join that team.   

If you feel the need you can always report it on the issue tracker. Glad I could help! https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues
replies.body_tagged:
